subject: General Science
topic: Aavart Sarani ke Mool Siddhant (Periodic Table Basics)
question_en: What is the name of the periodic table?
explanation_en:
Nitrogen is the name of the periodic table.
Periodic table sikshit is based on Groups, Periods, and Elements.
Group 15 elements are located in group 15, and Nitrogen is one of them.
explanation_hi:
प्रत्यक्षिति का नाम क्या है।
प्रत्यक्षिति सिक्षिति एक पर्यस्तिति एनाम को।
प्रत्यक्षिति एनाम का भाषा क्या है।
प्रत्यक्षिति एनाम का भाषा क्या है।
question_en: What is the chemical symbol of Nitrogen gas?
explanation_en:
The chemical symbol of Nitrogen gas is N.
In English, Nitrogen is represented by N.
explanation_hi: नार्म एनाम का भाषा क्या है।
question_en: Which gas is essential for living things?
explanation_en:
Nitrogen is not essential for living organisms, but Oxygen is.
In Hindi, Oxygen is represented by ऑक्या and is essential for life.
explanation_hi: नार्म को जीवीकाओ वृद्रीकाओ को जीविकाओ होंसलेसिकाओ से दिन्ताओ से बुल्याओ का संरक्षकाओ।
